pages.text:
Begin Mini-Page 20081
EXPLORE LAGO MAR COUNTRY CLUB
A premier private golf club in South Florida, just 20 minutes from Fort Lauderdale and Hollywood.
Receive a warm welcome upon your arrival and a carefree experience during your visit to Lago Mar the first time and every time. We invite you to immerse in a space that’s more than just a country club but a community of friendships. Lago Mar employees work to provide our members, their families and guests with exceptional experience and service. Whether it’s greeting members by name, taking a special request, or serving them in one of our dining areas, our team provides personalized service ensuring every member feels special.
For the Golfer
For a golfer, there is no better experience than a fabulous Plantation golf course in a spectacular setting. The course enables golfers of all skill levels to enjoy a round and features:
A complete redesign in 2009 by Kipp Schulties
Rolling, open land
Impressive water elements
Beauty and challenge at every hole
Five tee choices
Impeccable course conditions
A True Private Club
New Ownership / New Possibilities
Lago Mar Country Club is truly the Club that fits your lifestyle. Members also enjoy
Six Har-tru tennis courts with lights
Three casual and fine dining restaurants
Trackman golf simulators and trackman range
End Mini-Page 20081

Begin Mini-Page 20044
PRIVATE EVENTS AT LAGO MAR
A beautiful South Florida wedding and special event venue located in Plantation, Florida, less than 7 miles from Fort Lauderdale.
Lago Mar Country Club provides beautiful wedding ceremonies on our picturesque golf course and lakeside area as well as a beautiful ballroom overlooking the pool area, fountain and surrounding golf course. Our Main Dining Room seats up to 130 but can be easily transformed for smaller events as well. The Dining Room, Oak Room and 19th Hole Bar & Grill is also the perfect venue for daytime and evening social and corporate events.
The Professional Event Staff at Lago Mar
Nothing makes an event run more smoothly than working with a professional team. We have carefully selected area vendors that are all experienced event professionals who have demonstrated the best attributes in their field. We are proud to recommend them for your event.
Our catering team, including our culinary trained chefs, and staff are there to assist in planning and delivering memorable events. We have packages available and also happy to customize menus to fit your needs.
We pride ourselves in excellent customer service for all our guests. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you to make your event a WOW experience from start to finish!
Host your event with us!
For additional information about hosting your wedding or private event at Lago Mar Country Club please fill out the below form or contact 954.472.7044.
End Mini-Page 20044

MEMBERSHIP AT LAGO MAR COUNTRY CLUB
Whether you’re an active golfer, tennis player or looking for social interaction,
Lago Mar is the perfect Club for you.  Explore our membership options below.
